info.name: Tumblr Pastel Damask Dash Theme (10 Color Options)
info.description: A simple patterned dashboard theme with code that's compatible for the new header style. Feel free to edit anything, or msg me on tumblr @ eatyourheirs if you want something changed/made more accessible. This code has certain things blocked from displaying (like tumblr's seasonal dots) based on my own personal preferences but that coding is easily removable.
info.additionalInfo: Used in conjunction with Harmonia Pastelis Post Icons and Cursive Tumblr Logo Updates: 11/1 - Theme now works on inbox, tagged pages, etc. 11/3 - Removed border around icons. 1/8 - Fixed for the new next page buttons. 12/13 - Code tweaks & updates. 1/20 - Code updates 6/26 - Major updates to new width
